entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is mentioned as a Death Eater who has met Neville's parents and is now torturing him with the Crucio spell. She is described as having an evil smile and being 'transported' with excitement.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as a boy who has been captured by Bellatrix and her Death Eaters. He fights against his captor's grip and roars at Bellatrix to not give in to the prophecy.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who has a prophecy that Bellatrix wants him to give her. Neville roars at Harry to not give in to the prophecy.

entities.name: longbottom
entities.description: Longbottom is mentioned as Neville's parents' name and also as Neville himself who is being tortured by Bellatrix.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of dark wizards that Bellatrix is part of. They are mentioned as shouting for someone to stun Neville.

relationships.description: Bellatrix is torturing Neville with the Crucio spell, as described in the text: 'She raised her wand. “Crucio!”'.
Bellatrix wants Harry to give her a prophecy, as described in the text: 'Unless Potter wants to give us the prophecy —'.

Neville is resisting Bellatrix's torture, as described in the text: 'I DOE YOU HAB!' roared Neville, and he fought so hard against his captor’s encircling grip that the Death Eater shouted, “Someone Stun him!”'
